title: Timeout
desc:
How long to wait for the AI to respond before timing out, in seconds.
Default is 20.0.

title: Memory
desc:
How many actions and results the AI can remember. 0 or less will use the whole story.
Default is 20.

title: Generation Length
desc:
The upper limit of words the AI will generate per action.
Default is 60.

title: Temperature
desc:
Lower temperatures make the AI more picky, higher make the AI more sporadic.
Default is 0.8.

title: Top K Value
desc:
Keep only the top K tokens with the highest probability.
Default is 40.

title: Top P Value
desc:
Keep only the tokens with a cumulative probability greater or equal to P.
Default is 0.9.

title: Repetition Penalty
desc:
1 is no penalty, <1 makes it more likely to repeat, >1 makes it less likely to repeat.
Default is 1.1.
